name: Anti Gravity Warriors VR
description: Fight alien space robots and mutant monsters in this immersive, Sci-Fi, zero gravity environment. Battle to the death in this vr game!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, or 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia gtx™ 960 AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, or 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD rx 480, gtx 1060 Storage: 3 GB available space
